title: New: Bravestation – 13th Floor
body:
Toronto trio **Bravestation** channel some serious Duran Duran vibes on latest single, _13th Floor_.

Comfortably their most pop outing to date, it’s devilishly enjoyable and in truth, the hook wouldn’t feel too out of place in Netflix’s recent hit The Get Down. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
